title: Skin Randomiser
body:
Has this ever been discussed?

I'd love for a feature where you could pick your champion and then select to randomise the skin out of what you own.

Thanks would be great :)

replies.body: I think this would be a pretty cool idea. I know I have trouble deciding which skin to use when I have several for a champion - like Annie! :D

Yeah, I agree. 
I usually play Championship Thresh as support, Classic Thresh as a jungler, and Deep Terror Thresh as a top laner. :D
But it would be fun if I had an option to select a random skin. :)
And then people with only 1 skin cri.
